description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In this exciting twin-stick shooter, players have to complete mazes and defeat bosses using a variety of weapons and abilities. Play with friends and work your way through the 30 mazes of the game!
